mapper.insert:
select HSP_UHF_RDR_RDR_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into HSP_UHF_RDR ( RDR_SEQ, RDR_ID, RDR_NAM, RDR_TYP, MTR_TYP, MTR_COD, RDR_LOC, RDR_STA, RDR_PAR, RDR_DEP, BUY_DAT, FIX_DAT, FIX_MAN, MNT_COM, MNT_MAN, MNT_TEL, TCP_FLG, WIF_FLG, RDR_IP, RDR_PORT, CRT_USR_NO, CRT_USR_NAM, CRT_TIM, MOD_USR_NO, MOD_USR_NAM, MOD_TIM ) values ( #{rdrSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mtrTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtrCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrSta,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rdrPar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fixDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fixMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mntCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mntMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mntTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tcpFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wifFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rdrIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdrPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{crtUsrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtUsrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUsrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modUsrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update HSP_UHF_RDR set RDR_ID = #{rdrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDR_NAM = #{rdrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDR_TYP = #{rdrTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, MTR_TYP = #{mtrTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MTR_COD = #{mtrCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDR_LOC = #{rdrLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDR_STA = #{rdrSta,jdbcType=CHAR}, RDR_PAR = #{rdrPar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDR_DEP = #{rdrDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_DAT = #{buyDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIX_DAT = #{fixDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIX_MAN = #{fixMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNT_COM = #{mntCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNT_MAN = #{mntMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNT_TEL = #{mntTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCP_FLG = #{tcpFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, WIF_FLG = #{wifFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, RDR_IP = #{rdrIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDR_PORT = #{rdrPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MOD_USR_NO = #{modUsrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_USR_NAM = #{modUsrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_TIM = #{modTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where RDR_SEQ = #{rdrSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
